page.title: 10Peter Fraser,Fearn.
page.content: Peter Fraser, one time Prime Minister of New Zealand,was born in Hill of Fearn on 28th August1884.The house in which he was born is still occupied and is about 20 metres from the school.His father, Donald,was a bootmaker.Peter was schooled from 5 to 11 years old and was a hard worker and well liked.Peter had two brothers and a sister.His sister went to South Africa,a brother went to London and another brother went to Toronto.Peter himself first went to London and thento New Zealand.There, he became involved in politics,eventually becoming Prime Minister.During his time as Prime Minister,he revisited his birth place on several occasions.This is recorded in the school logs books for the period.
